numbered_ace_sentences: 1. MLB has 40 percent players of color.
2. MLB has the least amount of players of color.
3. MLB has 20 percent managers and head coaches of color.
4. MLB has the second least amount of managers and head coaches of color.
5. MLS has 41 percent head coaches of color.
6. MLS has the highest amount of head coaches of color.
7. NBA has 83 percent players of color.
8. WNBA has 83 percent players of color.
9. NBA and WNBA have the highest amount of players of color.
10. NFL has more than 70 percent players of color.
11. NFL has 13 percent coaches of color.
12. I wonder why MLB has so few coaches of color.
13. In MLB, 2 in 5 players are people of color.
14. In MLB, 1 in 5 coaches are people of color.
15. I wonder why 13 percent of NFL coaches are people of color.
16. In NFL, 74 percent of players are people of color.
17. If a person does not see himself in his idols then it is harder for the person to believe that the person can become what the person wants to be.
18. A person of color can want to become an NFL coach.
19. If a person of color never sees a person of color be an NFL coach then the person of color can have less belief.
20. A person can want to be an MLB player.
21. Some MLB players do not look like this person.
22. If this person only sees MLB players that do not look like this person then this person will probably feel discouraged.
23. If this person feels discouraged then this person might not go after the dream of this person.
24. The headline is: Percentage of People of Color in Professional Sports.
